thread.section_title: Outdoorsy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Outdoorsy | www.outdoorsy.co
thread.title: Lisa Wooton Silkstone
thread.title_full: Outdoorsy reviewed by Lisa Wooton Silkstone

author: Lisa Wooton Silkstone
title: Lisa Wooton Silkstone
text: I was having some trouble making my reservation on the website. The owner was very helpful and did all he could on his end. He sent a message to Jessica at Outdoorsy and she followed up with me quickly and efficiently and got everything straightened out. She was great!
